about_the_game:
You are the guy who take part in an cryo experiment and go to sleep for 100 years. Little did you know that your life will change so dramatically. 10 Years after the start of the experiment Aliens visits the Earth and the humans start trading with Intergalactical intelligences. Your cryo tank and espacially you become part of the Trade as a interessting artifact. Little did they know that your sleep will sometimes end and your will to go back home will be unstoppable. Are you ready to find your way home?

The Game

A rouge-like bullet hell top down shooter with procedurally generated levels, different biomes, customizable weapons, bosses and hidden secrets.

Random Generated Level

Constant repetition is boring, which is why the runs in spacestranded are randomly generated based on seeds and thus offer a new experience with each run.

Customizable Weapons

We all like it when we have more control in games and can choose how best to defeat the next boss. In randomly distributed boxes in the world you can therefore find different types of weapons with different basic values and ammunition ​​that can be forged to get better stats.

Bullet Hell

Bosses

Defeat numerous bosses in the future. Each biome will have its own final boss.

Different Bioms

Through the game you will pass 3 or 4 different bioms with different enemies and bosses.

Little did you know that your life will change so dramatically. 10 Years after the start of the experiment Aliens visits the Earth and the humans start trading with Intergalactical intelligences. Your cryo tank and espacially you become part of the Trade as a interessting artifact. Little did they know that your sleep will sometimes end and your will to go back home will be unstoppable. Are you ready to find your way home?

The Game

We all like it when we have more control in games and can choose how best to defeat the next boss. In randomly distributed boxes in the world you can therefore find different types of weapons with different basic values and ammunition ​​that can be forged to get better stats.

name: Space Stranded

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: A top down, action bullet hell roguelike with customizable weapons, perks and seed based random generated runs! Can you shoot your way home?
